entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
